name: Okto ouroboros
description:
Okto Ouroboros is a third-person shooting game created for the Epic Mega jam. Players will take the role of a goddess trying to kill an 8-headed serpent on top of a Greek temple.

Controls:

AWSD - movement

right click - aim

left click - shoot

p - pause

Team:

Kevin Hung - Environmental Artist

Jackie Ching- Programmer

Grant Lee- Programmer

Charles Mao- Character/technical Artist

Hojune Kwak- Audio creation/Implementation.
